[info] Xule version: 3.0.23584 -
[info] loaded in 3.77 secs at 2023-07-12T18:31:03 - /Users/campbellpryde/Downloads/wb-20221231/wb-20221231x20f.htm

[DQC.US.0117.10098] In the statement 00200 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF COMPREHENSIVE INCOME the concept us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncludingAssessedTax with a value of 1,980,795,000 is not equal to the dimensional breakdown of 1,633,242,000 using the dimension srt:ProductOrServiceAxis and the second dimension us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis: AdvertisingAndMarketingMember --> 1,633,242,000 --> us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis=us-gaap:NonrelatedPartyMember, srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=wb:AdvertisingAndMarketingMember
On the face financial statements it is expected that values reported are dimensionally complete for a given line item. If you added up the values of the dimensions the resulting sum should represent the actual aggregate value. This rule takes the dimensional values of an axis reported on the face financial statements and adds them up and compares them to the actual aggregate value reported anywhere in the filing. If they are different the rule reports an error.
The properties of this us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncludingAssessedTax fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Unit : USD Dimensions : srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=wb:AdvertisingAndMarketingMember Rule Element Id:10098 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - wb-20221231x20f.htm 196

property.name: label
property.value: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0117.10098] In the statement 00200 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF COMPREHENSIVE INCOME the concept us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncludingAssessedTax with a value of 1,596,650,000 is not equal to the dimensional breakdown of 1,392,723,000 using the dimension srt:ProductOrServiceAxis and the second dimension us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis: AdvertisingAndMarketingMember --> 1,392,723,000 --> srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=wb:AdvertisingAndMarketingMember, us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis=us-gaap:NonrelatedPartyMember
On the face financial statements it is expected that values reported are dimensionally complete for a given line item. If you added up the values of the dimensions the resulting sum should represent the actual aggregate value. This rule takes the dimensional values of an axis reported on the face financial statements and adds them up and compares them to the actual aggregate value reported anywhere in the filing. If they are different the rule reports an error.
The properties of this us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncludingAssessedTax fact are: Period :2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31 Unit : USD Dimensions : srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=wb:AdvertisingAndMarketingMember Rule Element Id:10098 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - wb-20221231x20f.htm 196
